name: Kimberlite Man (English)
description:
This game tells the story of a young hero named Chris, who isn't even a hero yet.

This game has a book where the lore is based on the story of this game.

News about the book and where to buy it:

https://olacdev.blogspot.com/2021/06/kimberlite-man-book.html

News about the game:

https://olacdev.blogspot.com/2021/06/kimberlite-man-game.html
